attributes.action: Introduce complusery plans & workshops involving everyone coming into the UK and the exsiting public to focus on patriotism and stronger society's in a free democrat enviorment...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a free society we can travel the EU and even the world now so freely. So why should any country including ours accept strangers to whom gain from us without any respect or understanding of our own values. We should all accept responsabiltiy on the way the world is and work togther as a team and get to know our neighbours of all colour and creed, bringing back a society that respect each other. A review on how we can show our visters and long term stayers our values is needed and if you feel the same please let us join togther and make a change for the best.
